description: My place is close to Close to 6, NQR, BDFM subway lines, countless bars, restaurants & coffee shops. You’ll love my place because it's on a quiet block in a lively neighborhood, facing a back yard. Impossibly quiet for NYC and very safe. Neighbors are all lovely, everything is clean and hallways are newly renovated. I have a giant comfy bed that's good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. People from all backgrounds are welcome!
name: East Village Pied-à-Terre aka Ultimate Crash Pad!
review: Taylor's place was everything I wanted and more! A perfect crash pad for a magical weekend. Would strongly recommend staying here
